description:
4 Homestead Court simply delivers in spades. This spectacular home showcases quality, size, and a resort-style pool with the perfect back yard for your entertaining pleasure plus a triple garage with extra storage. The residence enjoys exceptional street appeal, all located desirably on a 919m2 block in a quiet cul-de-sac just a short stroll from nearby parks, club house, pool, tennis courts and all of the wonderful amenities Harrington Grove has to offer.

The entrance provides the first hint of the elegant grandeur and style on offer throughout this residence with an entry foyer reminiscent of a five-star boutique hotel lobby offering ambient natural light and chandelier pendant lighting with high ceilings. This two-story beauty offers multiple living spaces for the entire family to enjoy featuring sunken formal living areas, media room, rumpus, family room, dining, home office with built in cabinetry and plenty of storage ,and a multipurpose room perfect for a gymnasium or even a 6th bedroom. This luxurious home makes a long lasting first impression that you won't forget in hurry!

The gourmet kitchen is appointed with 80mm stone bench tops, integrated fridge & freezer, dishwasher, double sink, built in microwave, generous Island bench, SMEG gas cooktop and electric oven. The kitchen also has a ZIP tap for further convenience all perfectly framed by beautiful pendant lighting. You will also find ample storage and bench space, glass splashback and last but certainly not least, an amazing walk-in pantry.

The upper-level filters plenty of natural light to both levels whilst showcasing all accommodation inclusive of a luxurious master retreat with his & hers fitted walk in robes and a huge ensuite with floor to ceiling tiling, shower niches, double vanity with stone bench tops, semi frameless shower screen and medicine cabinets for the added benefit of storage. The remaining four oversized bedrooms all feature large built-in-robes and ceiling fans, whilst the main bathroom is both spacious and beautifully presented with the highest of quality fittings.

The huge laundry is advantaged by double sinks, ample cabinetry & bench space with additional storage via an upstairs walk-in linen cupboard, multiple built in linen cupboards and under-stair storage ensuring there is no shortage of storage space throughout the home. Quality inclusions and benefits are highlighted through the home with 2 gas fireplaces, plantation shutters, outdoor blinds, ducted vacuum, 8 zone ducted air conditioning, alarm, intercom, solar hot water, surround sound throughout the entire home, high ceilings, feature lighting, storage shed, irrigationand much, much more.

Outside is just a dream with a stunning inground heated saltwater pool & spa with water features all framed by glass fencing, a full outdoor bathroom, built in BBQ and large alfresco area creating the perfect entertainer’s paradise.

Create the lifestyle you have been dreaming of! Call Meryl LaMacchia today on 0405 159 215 to arrange your inspection!

** We have, in preparing this document, used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained herein is true and accurate to the best of our knowledge. Prospective purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the above information.
